name: authorization-event
description: Information about an authorization event, including the timestamp, client details, and authorization decision.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The date and time when the authorization event occurred.

fields.name: address
fields.description: The network address of the client requesting authorization.

fields.name: token
fields.description: The access token presented for authorization.

fields.name: decision
fields.description: The authorization decision that was made.

fields.name: decision-details
fields.description: Additional details about the authorization decision.
